title: Champion Mastery
body: Did riot remove champion mastery if so why i worked to hard to get rank 7 with my mains and getting over 100k of mastery points my favorite champion{{champion:45}}

replies.body: Mastery shouldn't be impacted.  Indeed there was some maintenance going on during this time.  Is everything alright now?
its not back yet, but atleast we know what is going on xd

Guys they are on a manteinance...
Open your client and look in the top right, there is a button that says it!

Edit: Left, not right.

Same here! i have lost all my Mastery Points and lvls, why the heck should they have done it?
i got like 9 lvl 7 and after 2 months of spamming {{champion:117}} i got finally my last 7 Token. i feel so empty right now :(
Yeah all of my friends have the same problem we cant even view each others mastery scores. can't even flex lvl 7 in-game anymore {{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}
Same for for me, all my Champion Masteries are gone I hope it is just a Bug of some sort^^
Same for me, hope we get that back :)
Getting the same problem, hopefully it's sorted soon.
